content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_fence
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond_ore", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 31}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 33}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 14, "index": 34}]
thought: To craft the crimson fence, I first need to place 1 stick in the middle of the crafting grid. Therefore I will move 1 stick from slot 29 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_fence
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond_ore", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 29}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 31}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 33}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 14, "index": 34}]
thought: The second stick needs to go below the first stick, therefore I will move the stick from slot 11 to slot 8.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_fence
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond_ore", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 29}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 31}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 33}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 14, "index": 34}]
thought: The first planks need to go above the sticks, therefore I will move the planks from slot 29 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 3 with quantity 1

thought: The second planks need to go to the right of the sticks, therefore I will move the planks from slot 29 to slot 2.
Ok
